cards.parrafo: And it also works with any carrier and mobile phone
The recipient will never know it comes from you
We'll show you the exact location on an online map

screenLocalizar.titulo: One place to locate them all
screenLocalizar.parrafo: Once subscribed, you can use our interface to locate as many phones as you wish.

testimonios.parrafo: Enable the exact location of your phone with a single tap
testimonios.relato: ”I forgot my phone on the subway. Fullgeo allowed the person who found it to send me its location without unlocking it and I was able to recover it safely.”

testimonios.parrafo: Instantly show their precise position on a map
testimonios.relato: ”Simple and practical to locate our 12-year-old daughter when she goes out with her friends. All she has to do is click a link and we can be at ease.”

testimonios.titulo: Suspicious of an online buyer or seller?
testimonios.parrafo: Ask them to locate themselves before proceeding with the transaction
testimonios.relato: ”I was able to verify the whereabouts of a seller after paying a deposit for a scooter. Thanks to Fullgeo, our meeting was smooth and everything went well!”

funcionalidad.titulo: Perform a search on a number
funcionalidad.parrafo: Our technology starts locating and identifying the associated phone.
We send a text message to the target phone to locate it. This message is anonymous by default but can be customized to increase chances of success.
You will be automatically informed with the address as soon as the recipient confirms their location.

funciones.titulo2: Locate any phone today for just €0.50

prueba.parrafo: Try our solution for an unlimited 24-hour period for just €0.50. At the end of your trial period, you can choose to remain subscribed for €47.90 per month.

preguntas.parrafo: Our team is here to help, ask us anything.

acordeon1.titulo: Is it illegal to locate a third party?
acordeon1.parrafo: Fullgeo is completely legal and complies with CNIL recommendations. Fullgeo cannot work without third-party consent for geolocation.

acordeon1.titulo: What types of phones are compatible?
acordeon1.parrafo: Fullgeo works on all phones with internet connection.
Our service provides you with the exact location with an accuracy between 1 and 6 meters.
The third party will receive a text message within 2 minutes, and you will receive a notification immediately after the third party has given consent to be geolocated.

acordeon2.titulo: Does Fullgeo work if the third party's phone is turned off?
acordeon2.parrafo: The third party's phone must be turned on for tracking to work. However, as soon as it's turned on, geolocation messages will be received.

acordeon2.titulo: How much does mobile phone geolocation cost?
acordeon2.parrafo: The third party's phone must be turned on for tracking to work. However, as soon as it's turned on, geolocation messages will be received.

Your anonymity is important to us. The third party's geographical location is sent through a secure TLS (Transport Layer Security) protocol and is not visible to others. Your personal information and identity are not shared with anyone.

acordeon2.titulo: How can I cancel my subscription?
acordeon2.parrafo: The subscription is without commitment and can be canceled at any time by clicking the button below and following the on-screen instructions.

precios.texto: Take advantage of our 24-hour trial offer to discover our service.

contacto.texto: Get in touch with our dedicated team. We’ll be happy to assist you.

cards.texto: Our team is here to answer your questions; open the chat bubble at the bottom of this page.
We’ll be happy to assist you and usually reply within 24 hours.

faqs.texto: Quickly get the answers you need with our FAQs.
